FuncDef:
The rip version 2 broadcast command sets that RIP-2 packets are sent in broadcast mode.
The undo rip version command restores the default RIP version. The rip version 2 broadcast command sets that RIP-2 packets are sent in broadcast mode. The undo rip version command restores the default RIP version. By default, the version running on an interface is 1.
